sentence.Network_en: The towering pine and cypress trees defy frost and snow.
The pine and the cypress remain green all the year round.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cipres, from late Latin cypressus, from Greek kuparissos

entry.def: A cypress is a type of conifer .

means.word_mean: 1. wood of any of various cypress trees especially of the genus Cupressus
2. any of numerous evergreen conifers of the genus Cupressus of north temperate regions having dark scalelike leaves and rounded cones
